website_summaries.verdict: These lined copper mugs give you the beautiful look of copper with the solid function of a stainless steel lining.
pros: Double lined with stainless steel for those who want to keep their drinks colder longer
Covered with an exterior lacquer to preserve the shine of the copper
cons: These mugs are not made for use with hot liquids, they have a tendency to become hot to the touch

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of mugs I ordered. The first(a different brand) were damaged so I ordered this set to replace. I can’t believe the difference. This brand if heavier and so well made. The first felt like something you might buy at the dollar store. These were a gift and were well received. Awesome craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: RIC

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely worth the higher price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write a review but this was a must! We ordered these Moscow Mule Copper Mugs once and two weren’t perfect so we returned them w absolutely NO problem! Because of the reviews we decided to order again. Quality and double walled stainless inside makes all the difference!! Oh my gosh they were perfect! Beautifully packaged as well. Our recommendation...Don’t buy cheap ones! Buy quality like these, you won’t be disappointed! Remember NO on Dishwasher! Wash by hand! R&S
customer_reviews.author: R&S🌸

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy getting kicked by a mule
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was beyond my expectations. I was thrilled when I opened the semi-ornate case the mugs come in and put them to good use the same evening with some neighbors who were WOWED by how nice the mug-set is. I got the same response from friends to whom I sent pics of it. The shipping was done at almost light-speed, as well, which I thought reflected upon the customer-service care of the vendor. I might buy another set, due to the increasing popularity of Moscow Mules. Word travels fast! Very nice product, all-in-all great purchase. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time with this cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and have already initiated the return. The quality is terrible and there are a lot of scuffs/missing finish. Also each mug has a made in India sticker on it. For the cost you should order a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: daolevsky

customer_reviews.title: Sparks a Lively Conversation
customer_reviews.text: I received this set of four copper SS lined mugs as a birthday gift to replace or augments a set of two, which are from the 60's and well battered. Our guests think these mugs are a great way to present and old favorite with some new twists by adding tropical flavors, pipeapple, lemon, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Bob Yurecka

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These really are nice. My husband has been wanting Moscow Mule Mugs lately but we're seeing a lot of cheapie sets in stores since they're trendy right now. I bought these as a Christmas gift. These are the real deal. Solid copper and packaged really nicely. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I've ever given, best gift I've ever received!
customer_reviews.text: The best gift I've ever given, and the best gift I have ever received! I was given a set of these mugs as a gift and I love them! It's all I use to drink just about everything. I liked them so much I gave a set to my dad for his birthday, and now it's all he uses, too! These are spectacular mugs, and the highest quality I've ever seen! Thank you, Urban Vintage LA, for supplying them. Please bring them back as they're going to be Christmas gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R.

customer_reviews.title: Moscow Mule copper cups with stainless steel lining
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Moscow Mule copper cups. We particularly like the stainless steel lining and feel that it helps to keep the cups extra cold. Love, love, love these cups. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous packaging and product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who loves copper. First of all, incredibly well packaged to avoid damage. Once we cut through the two cardboard boxes (One Amazon's and one the seller's) we saw a beautifully black package with a black and white ribbon. The paper was not the chintzy stuff. My wife wants to reuse it. The mugs were carefully cradled inside the box and were beautiful. The quality looks first rate. I have a very happy wife and am a happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Kunce

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs! Clean well and with no signs of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs! Clean well and with no signs of tarnish. I have tried others and they tarnished after one wash. These have held up great. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicanne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received these mugs today and was very disappointed two of the mugs were chipped in the rim and everything smelled like cheap cologne . They are not 100 % copper as described. I'm returning and ordering from a different company
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas gift for my daughter. She immediately recognized the name and the quality. They will be a beautiful addition to their bar for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very classy mugs to give as a gift! They look and feel expensive and are comfortable to hold. We originally bought them as a gift, and liked them so much that we bought ourselves a set. Very happy with our choice!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Made a beautiful gift to myself!  No varnish inside or out.  Beautiful and great drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these mugs based on the fact that they are pure copper and that there is no varnish on the inside to slow down tarnishing. I don't mind caring for them. It's really quite easy. They are beautiful, well-made, and excellent for cold drinks. I was quite pleased with this purchase and will consider sending them as a gift in the future. The company sent extra recipes via e-mail after, but the basic mule recipes came with the gift set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was very nice! I was disheartened when seeing the actual glass. They have started to tarnish and scratch up after minimal use. They are also extremely light and seem to be of low quality. We will look elsewhere for a nicer set and use these for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Moscow Mules
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these. We also bought an additional two so she would have a six person serving. Of course we used the receipt that accompanied the mugs - they do taste better in pure copper, Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Our Moscow Mules have never tasted so good! The mugs come in a lovely gift box. There are a number of people on my list that will get a set for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Tami O

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was a hit! The quality is exceptional even though I didn't use them personally. Well packaged in a beautiful box and the recipient was quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Do notice a little discoloring on inside of mugs but I think that is normal with copper mugs. The discoloring is black in a few areas.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely loved it! The box it comes in is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my brother and his girlfriend. They absolutely loved it! The box it comes in is exactly like the one in the photo and they appear to be great quality. I found some in the Pottery Barn store in our local mall for $50 each and these are just as good of quality if not better, for a way more affordable price! Would definitely purchase again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Only true copper mugs I've found with no layer of poly inside. When you clean these you HAVE to dry them inside completely. That being said, if you or whoever you're getting this for is a Moscow mule lover and want the copper mugs to be more than aesthetic, these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. It's well made and shows quality craftmenship. I was also very impressed with the packaging and storage box. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These look so good and and keep my drink so cold. I wish I had discovered the Mule mugs earlier
customer_reviews.author: Tammy O. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Cups come pretarnished!
customer_reviews.text: I have now had two separate shipments of these cups. Both of which have come already scratched or tarnished in some way. If you are spending this type of money on mule cups, I expect them to be in new condition not look used
customer_reviews.author: The Urban Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value and I cannot recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable price for such a great product. The box, the mugs, and the shot glass are all beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ali R. Mahini

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful. The second you open the package you know you have bought something of good quality. I have bought copper mugs for everyone in my family, but these are by far my favorite ones. Very nice set for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mugs- but arrived damaged. 2 of the mugs had a large dent in them, another mug was completely smashed into an egg shape. Not sure how that happened- the shipping box and the Black box they were packed in were completely fine. Really disappointed as these were a gift for my husband
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: REAL copper!
customer_reviews.text: my parents loved this gift! It comes in such a nice box and the cups are better quality than some of the 'copper' mugs you see on Amazon. These are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Emm

customer_reviews.title: Strongly Constructed and Crafted
customer_reviews.text: The all copper mugs are very well well made. The dimple-effect adds to the overall quality. Looking forward to using these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for daughter for Christmas and had to order some for myself. Love them

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty feeling. Bought as a gift and they loved them. They appeared to be well made and heavy duty.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely boxed and all copper. Great gift box, but I am keeping them for me.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and the presentation is quite nice. The added bonus: a small booklet of recipes! I purchased them as a gift, and I'm sure the birthday girl will be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Lovely packaging and the product in person looked so much better than the cheaper options out there
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. Lovely packaging and the product in person looked so much better than the cheaper options out there. Hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Dini Vo

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy, well-made cups that make it fun to serve ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, well-made cups that make it fun to serve Moscow Mules. The box makes an attractive display when giving the cups as a gift. I found that it was easy to keep the cups free of oxidation by cleaning and drying soon after they are done being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift! Beautiful, classy, and 100% copper
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. After looking at all of the other options (which many had mixed metals or weren't as attractive) and reading the reviews that had been left for this set, I knew this was the one to buy. Aside from the corner of the box that had ripped (likely due to rain, as I live in the PNW), it was perfect! We used them right away, and were very pleased. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - particularly the welded copper handles. Many options don’t weld their handles on and/or the handles are made of brass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: was looking for a good quality product with copper and stainless steel and these fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: V. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for Christmas. They look and work great and the box they can in made them look like a paid twice what I did. I have recommended these many times since the. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are great quality. We've enjoyed Moscow and Orange Mules in them a few times already! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. Grantham

customer_reviews.title: How the order was received
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of Copper Cocktails Mugs. Came in a nice gift wrapped box as requested.

customer_reviews.title: Missing product
customer_reviews.text: No shot cup was included with the four mugs as was advertised

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We love having drinks in these and showing them off

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and presentation, perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and couldn't have asked for better. Comes in a wonderful presentation/storage box and the mugs themselves are of excellent quality. Vendor is also highly communicative. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pavon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, it's not a Moscow Mule without a copper mug ;)
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Variety and quality of products, and ease of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it arrived without the promised recipe booklet. Not a very good omen but my husband (gift for him) does like the set. Would have given it 5s if it had been a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: 7th Year Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: The mug set came in a really pretty wrapped gift box. Almost didn't want to unwrap it! The copper mugs were made well, keeps the drinks really cold! My husband was very happy with his gift!

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Gift Box; Gorgeous Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never kept a gift box before, but this one is a gorgeous addition to the bar area of my home. I absolutely love the handmade dimples on the shiny mugs and am excited to buy more of these as gifts for friends, family and clients.

customer_reviews.title: the welded on handles are very nice!

product_meta.title: Set of 4 Moscow Mule Mugs with Stainless Steel Lining and Shot Glass in Classy Gift Box, Lined Premium Handcrafted Hammered Food Safe Heavy Copper Cups for Drinking
feature_bullets: DOUBLE WALL MUGS: Forget flimsy copper-plated cups. These shiny Moscow Mule mugs have 2 solid walls: copper outside, stainless-steel inside. They are heavy-duty and super sturdy; they weigh over half a pound each. They are perfect for everyday use since they do not require special maintenance. They are also great for commercial and restaurant establishments.

COPPER KITCHEN DECOR: You'll want to display these exquisite Moscow Mule mugs lined with stainless-steel for all to see. These barrel shape copper vessels are hammered for classic texture, then lacquered (outside only) for permanent lustrous shine. Drink your favorite cocktails, tea, juices, water and more in these beautiful handcrafted goblets.

LINED COPPER MUGS WITH SOLID COPPER HANDLE: Forget those rickety, riveted handles that rust, leak & come loose. Your Urban Vintage LA Moscow Mule cups have welded-on handles... leakproof, rustproof & virtually breakproof.

GIFT BOXED WITH COPPER SHOT GLASS: Your copper gift set includes four 16-oz. mugs, beautifully boxed with our solid copper shot glass, illustrated recipe book & helpful care guide. Ready for gifting, they are perfect for, Christmas, holiday, seventh wedding anniversary, wedding, retirement, birthday, housewarming, bridal showers, groomsmen parties, hostess gift-giving, gift for men, gift for women, summer gifts and more.

100% SAFE & GUARANTEED: Rigorously tested for safety, these double-walled cups contain no cheap alloys or lacquer linings. These gorgeous mugs are ideal for drinking all mixed drinks, water, soft drinks, juices, iced tea, beer, wine & more. They are simply great for everyday use! Not happy with your set? Return it for a full money-back refund.
